name: Ninja ScruffTuna's Epic Coin Generator
description:
Have you ever wanted to generate coins? Have you ever wanted to see what happens when a small test project gets out of hand? Do you want to experience what it's like to be the top 1%? Well, I got you covered my Epic Coin Generator!
